local_intent: Perceive t_block, move above it, and approach/align with 0.005 tolerance before verifying continued visibility.
assumptions: t_block is detectable within three scan attempts
Workspace around the block is free for approach
No grasping required; alignment is contact-free
coherence_with_global: Matches the global flow up to the approach phase: scan and confirm t_block, move above, perform ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.005, and verify visibility. Omits yaw setting, push, and post-push checks as they occur later in the GLOBAL_BT.
